description.para: Proprietary HCI event codes for handling HCI events in callbacks.

briefdescription.para: Reset sequence complete.
LE connection complete.
LE enhanced connection complete.
Disconnect complete.
LE connection update complete.
LE create connection cancel command complete.
LE advertising report.
Read RSSI command complete.
LE Read channel map command complete.
Read transmit power level command complete.
Read remote version information complete.
LE read remote features complete.
LE LTK request reply command complete.
LE LTK request negative reply command complete.

Vendor specific.
Hardware error.

LE encrypt command complete.

LE read suggested default data length command complete.

LE set data length command complete.
LE read maximum data length command complete.
LE remote connection parameter request.
LE data length change.
LE read local P-256 public key.
LE generate DHKey complete.

LE read phy command complete.

LE phy update complete.

LE extended advertise enable command complete

LE periodic advertising sync transfer received event.

LE connection IQ report event.
LE CTE request failed event.
LE set connection CTE receive parameters command complete.
LE set connection CTE transmit parameters command complete.
LE connection CTE request enable command complete.
LE connection CTE response enable command complete.
LE read antenna information command complete.

LE Request peer SCA complete.
LE set CIG parameters command complete.
LE remove CIG command complete.
LE setup ISO data path command complete.

LE create BIG complete.
LE terminate BIG complete.

LE set data related address changes command complete.

LE periodic advertising subevent data request event.

Initiate an HCI reset sequence.

HCI core initialization.
WSF event handler for core HCI.
Set the maximum reassembled RX ACL packet length. Minimum value is 27.
Set TX ACL queue high and low watermarks.

parameterdescription.para: Disable flow on a connection when this many ACL buffers are queued.
Disable flow on a connection when this many ACL buffers are queued.

briefdescription.para: Set LE supported features configuration mask.

true to set feature bit and false to clear it

briefdescription.para: Set LE supported features configuration mask.

parameterdescription.para: Feature bit to set or clear
true to set feature bit and false to clear it

description.para: This is an optimized interface for certain HCI commands that simply read a value. The stack uses these functions rather than their corresponding functions in the command interface. These functions can only be called after the reset sequence has been completed.

briefdescription.para: Return a pointer to the BD address of this device.
Return the white list size.
Return the advertising transmit power.

Return the number of ACL buffers supported by the controller.

HCI event callback type.

detaileddescription.para: This callback function sends events from HCI to the stack.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to HCI callback event structure.

briefdescription.para: HCI security callback type.

detaileddescription.para: This callback function sends certain security events from HCI to the stack. The security events passed in this callback are the LE Rand Command Complete event and the LE Encrypt Command Complete event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to HCK callback event structure.

detaileddescription.para: This callback function sends ACL data from HCI to the stack.

parameterdescription.para: WSF buffer containing an ACL packet.

parameterdescription.para: WSF buffer containing an ISO packet.
